timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this also check if the function has a name before using Lambda?
timeline.author: stevemessick

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure here - the 'lamda' icon is the one that the Dart plugin is using for non-top level functions, whether the item is actually a lamda or not.
replies.author: devoncarew

replies.bodyText: Note that this PR is just updating our code to the latest from the Dart plugin - if we think we should change something here we should adjust it upstream.
replies.author: devoncarew
